mapper.insert: insert into account_info (id, user_name, phone_num, channel, channel_user_id, account, create_date, update_date,status,creator,belong_user) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phoneNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{channel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{channelUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{status,jdbcType=BIT},#{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{belongUser,jdbcType=BIGINT})

insert into account_info (id, user_name, phone_num, channel, channel_user_id, account, pwd, create_date, update_date, status,headers,ext,creator,operator,belong_user) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phoneNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{channel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{channelUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{status,jdbcType=BIT},#{headers,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{ext,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{belongUser,jdbcType=BIGINT} ) on duplicate key update user_name= values (user_name), phone_num= values (phone_num), channel= values (channel), channel_user_id= values (channel_user_id), account= values (account), pwd= values (pwd), create_date= values (create_date), update_date= values (update_date), status= values (status), headers= values (headers), ext= values (ext), creator= values (creator), operator= values (operator), belong_user= values (belong_user)
mapper.update: update account_info set yn=1, update_date=NOW() where id = ${id}

update account_info
ext=#{ext},
headers=#{headers},
update_date=#{updateDate},
channel_user_id=#{channelUserId}
where channel = #{channel} and account = #{account} and yn=0
